scripts.start: if [ ! -d 'node_modules/' ]; then yarn install; fi && yarn run development
scripts.deploy: yarn run clean && babel . -d dist --ignore dist,node_modules --copy-files --source-maps=inline && cd dist && yarn install
scripts.docker-deploy: yarn run clean && babel . -d dist --ignore dist,node_modules --copy-files --source-maps=inline && cd dist && yarn install
scripts.build:development: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=development babel . -d dist --ignore dist,node_modules --copy-files --source-maps=inline && cd dist && yarn install
scripts.build:stage: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=stage babel . -d dist --ignore dist,node_modules --copy-files --source-maps=inline && cd dist && yarn install
scripts.build:production: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=production babel . -d dist --ignore dist,node_modules --copy-files --source-maps=inline && cd dist && yarn install
scripts.docker: docker build -t boilerplate-api . && docker run -p 5000:5000 -p 5001:5001 -it boilerplate-api
